abstract: San Antonio, Tex, officials will authorize more body cameras for sheriff's deputies in the field; move comes after Hispanic man Gilbert Flores was fatally shot by deputies after video showed he apparently had his hands in air; authorities have opened investigation.
lead_paragraph: Latino activists, lawmakers and civil rights groups continued to question and condemn the shooting of a Hispanic man by sheriff’s deputies on Monday in San Antonio.

headline.main: After a Killing, Body Cameras Are Expanded in San Antonio
